subject: New Booking Received - Professional Photography Session
content:

Booking Details

  • Booking ID: booking-123

  • Status: Confirmed
  • Customer Notes: Please bring outdoor clothing for the session

Please confirm or update the booking status as needed.

This is a mock email notification. In production, this would be sent via SMTP.
